options.name: Cisco Umbrella Investigate API URL
options.description: The URL of the Cisco Umbrella Investigate API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Cisco Umbrella Investigate API key
options.description: The Key of the Cisco Umbrella Investigate API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Cisco Umbrella Admin API URL
options.description: The URL of the Cisco Umbrella Management API including the schema (i.e., https://).

options.name: Return Statuses
options.description: Select one of more statuses that will be returned when searching.  The default is to only return domains that have a status of "malicious".

options.name: Get WHOIS Data
options.description: If checked, each domain will get the WHOIS information for domains that have your selected Return Statuses.

options.name: Allow Blocklist Submission
options.description: Allows you to submit a domain to be blocklisted on Cisco Umbrella.

options.name: Allow Allowlist Submission
options.description: Allows you to submit a domain to be allowlisted on Cisco Umbrella.
